name: Magnetic Rush
description:
PLEASE READ BEFORE PLAYING.

I forgot to add a how to play page.

WASD moves one block!

SPACEBAR Switches magnet polarity (PUSH/PULL)

GOAL!! Place the crystals in the Blue glowing Teleporters to earn points.

Pickup the golden Hammer/Wrench to fix some of the floor

WATCH OUT FOR THE METEORS!!!

Enjoy :)!
